activities: beSatisfied is a marketing research survey data collection company.  We help our clients make better decisions through customer surveys conducted via the web, telephone, mail or in-person.  Results of the data collected are uploaded to our password-secured website for analysis by our clients.  No data or survey information is accessible except to the user who has specific security certificates.  We recognize the privacy concerns and rights of our research participants, and are committed to ensuring the privacy of our clients, survey respondents and visitors.  Respondents always have the option to opt-out at any time.
